pages.text: These crops likes being planted in high places, usually on mountains. Also, the higher up they're planted, the faster they can grow when receiving growth ticks.$(br2)Can only be planted at y=100 and higher.

pages.name: Collis Crop
pages.text: Flip the page to see the recipe for these seeds.
Dropped from Goldenrods/Collis crops. Used to craft Golden Bread.
Consuming this bread restores about the same amount of saturation and hunger as regular bread, but also applies the Luck effect for some time.
